0.2.name: wordpress/flickr-set-slideshows
0.2.description:
Easily embed slideshows of your Flickr photosets in your posts and pages with this Flickr set slideshows plugin.

Once you have linked your Flickr account to the plugin (see Plugin Setup section), creating a slideshow of one of your Flickr photosets is as easy as choosing the set and the slideshow's dimensions from a drop down list. You can then embed the slideshow anywhere in your posts or pages by copying and pasting a shortcode.

When you create or edit a slideshow, Flickr set slideshow will provide you with an instant preview.
